mapper.select:
select su.job_id from factor.strategy_instance si left join factor.sys_factor_fav sff on sff.instance_id = si.id left join factor.sys_user su on sff.user_id = su.user_id
si.is_deleted = 0 and su.job_id is not null and si.id = #{instanceId}

select su.job_id,su.user_id,su.user_name,su.work_start_time,su.work_end_time from factor.strategy_instance si left join factor.sys_factor_fav sff on sff.instance_id = si.id left join factor.sys_user su on sff.user_id = su.user_id
si.is_deleted = 0 and su.job_id is not null and si.id = #{instanceId}

select a.push_end_time, b.push_start_time from (select sii.id, sii.property_value as push_end_time, sii.instance_id from factor.strategy_instance_input sii where sii.property_key = 'pushEndTime' and sii.instance_id = #{instanceId}) a left join (select sii.id, sii.property_value as push_start_time, sii.instance_id from factor.strategy_instance_input sii where sii.property_key = 'pushStartTime' and sii.instance_id = #{instanceId}) b on a.id = b.id
